title: Infected Bodies
description: Allow me welcome you to Greenacre Rise, a superb development of 135 apartments, set in the serene atmosphere of a traditional canal side Victorian mill.Caringly renovated and conveniently located just two miles from the motorway, Greenacre Rise offers a vibrant mix of residential and business facilities, including a variety of retail outlets, a bar and an exclusive gym.Breakspear estate, one of the roughest housing estates in England lay a couple of miles to the west of the converted mill. Deep within the estate, an infection raged through the locals, converting the terrified residents into flesh eating zombies.It didn’t take long before the infection reached Greenacre Rise…
author: Ian Woodhead
